metadata.Title: CVE-2023-30577 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description: AMANDA (Advanced Maryland Automatic Network Disk Archiver) before tag-community-3.5.4 mishandles argument checking for runtar.c, a different vulnerability than CVE-2022-37705.

notes.Note: sbeattie> requires access to the non-default backup group to exploit upstream fixing commits incorrectly refer to CVE-2023-30547

criterions.comment: amanda package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
